member.name: T:BOOSE.AboutBOOSE
member.summary: About text displayed in the UI.

member.name: M:BOOSE.AboutBOOSE.about
member.summary: Returns information about this BOOSE interpreter implementation.

member.name: T:BOOSE.Ast.CommandStatement
member.summary: Statement wrapper for executable commands.

member.name: T:BOOSE.Ast.WriteStatement
member.summary: Simple output + draw-text statement.

member.name: T:BOOSE.Ast.TextCommand
member.summary:
Draws text at the current pen position.
Many BOOSE example programs (and some UI templates) use a text command rather than a write statement. This command supports both:
- Raw text: text hello world - Expression text: text "hello" or text someVar

member.name: T:BOOSE.Ast.IExpression
member.summary: An evaluatable expression.

member.name: T:BOOSE.Ast.IStatement
member.summary: Executable program statement.

member.summary: Executes BOOSE programs against an .

member.name: M:BOOSE.BooseInterpreter.Execute(System.String)
member.summary: Parse and execute a BOOSE program.

member.name: T:BOOSE.ICanvas
member.summary: Minimal canvas contract required by the BOOSE interpreter. The WinForms app provides an implementation (CommandCanvas).

member.name: P:BOOSE.ICanvas.Xpos
member.summary: Current pen X position.

member.name: P:BOOSE.ICanvas.Ypos
member.summary: Current pen Y position.

member.name: P:BOOSE.ICanvas.PenColour
member.summary: Pen colour used for drawing.

member.name: M:BOOSE.ICanvas.Clear
member.summary: Clear the canvas to a blank background.

member.name: M:BOOSE.ICanvas.Reset
member.summary: Reset the canvas (clear + reset pen state).

member.summary: Resize the underlying drawing surface.

member.name: M:BOOSE.ICanvas.SetColour(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set the pen colour using RGB values (0-255).

member.summary: Move the pen to (x,y) without drawing.

member.summary: Draw a line to (x,y) and update pen position.

member.summary: Draw a circle at the current pen position.

member.name: M:BOOSE.ICanvas.Rect(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Draw a rectangle from the current pen position.

member.name: M:BOOSE.ICanvas.Tri(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Draw a triangle based on width and height.

member.summary: Line-oriented parser for the BOOSE language as used in the supplied example programs.

member.name: T:BOOSE.Parsing.ExpressionParser
member.summary: Parses BOOSE expressions into an expression tree. Supports numeric, boolean, and string expressions.

member.name: T:BOOSE.Runtime.ArrayValue
member.summary: Typed array value for BOOSE.

member.name: T:BOOSE.Runtime.CommandFactory
member.summary:
Factory used for mapping BOOSE command keywords (moveto, pen, circle, ...) to ICommand objects.
Factory pattern requirement: commands are created here rather than scattered across the codebase.

member.name: T:BOOSE.Runtime.CommandFactorySingleton
member.summary: Singleton registry to provide a single CommandFactory instance.

member.name: T:BOOSE.Runtime.ExecutionContext
member.summary: Holds runtime state for program execution: variable scopes, method registry, canvas, and output.

member.name: P:BOOSE.Runtime.ExecutionContext.Methods
member.summary: All methods defined in the program.

member.name: M:BOOSE.Runtime.ExecutionContext.Assign(System.String,BOOSE.Runtime.Value)
member.summary: Assigns to the nearest existing scope; if not found, creates in current scope.
